016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.converter;
017
018import jakarta.faces.convert.Converter;
019import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
020
021import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertFalse;
022
023/**
024 * Extension of {@linkplain AbstractConverterTest} to also test the sanitizing
025 * inside the getAsString function.
026 *
027 * @param <C> identifying the concrete {@link Converter} to be tested.
028 * @param <T> identifying the type of elements to be used for values to be given
029 *            to the {@link Converter}
030 */
031public abstract class AbstractSanitizingConverterTest<C extends Converter<T>, T> extends AbstractConverterTest<C, T> {
032
033    /**
034     * Create an instance of the object containing a given malicious content that is
035     * to be converted into a string by this converter.
036     *
037     * @param content
038     * @return
039     */
040    protected abstract T createTestObjectWithMaliciousContent(String content);
041
042    @Test
043    protected void shouldSanitizeJavaScript() {
044        var toConvert = createTestObjectWithMaliciousContent("<script>");
045        var result = getConverter().getAsString(getFacesContext(), getComponent(), toConvert);
046        assertFalse(result.contains("<script"));
047    }
048
049}
